title: Orthopedic Dog Beds for Medium Dogs, Durable Egg Crate Foam Sofa Dog Bed wit Washable Removable Cover,Waterproof Lining,Pet Bed for Large Dogs (Navy Blue, 31.5" L x 25.2" W x 7" Th)
description: Tidore orthopedic dog bed provides your furry friends with a cozy and comfortable sleeping space.Our dog bed is made of high quality memory foam,which is soft,breathable and provides great support and comfort for your pet.The egg crate orthopedic dog bed is designed to alleviate joint pain and keep your pet healthy.The bottom is a non-slip design,which can effectively prevent the dog from moving the bed when it is in high excitement.The removable cover is machine washable,which is convenient to clean.The memory foam dog bed is suitable for all seasons,which can keep your pet warm in winter and cool in summer.Our dog bed is available in 3 sizes:M,L,XL.Please measure your pet before purchasing.If you have any questions about our products,please feel free to contact us,we will give you a satisfactory answer within 24 hours.
